product_name: Craft PB Glow Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: Riding at dawn or dusk? You'll be seen a mile away in the men's Craft PB Glow Bike Jersey with its super-reflective print across the chest and upper back. A gem for commuting, the men's PB Glow Bike Jersey from Craft makes your presence known. Super-cooling polyester fabric has channels that draw sweat off your skin and let it evaporate quickly, lowering your surface temperature by 6degF. Elastane adds just the right amount of stretch. Craft PB Glow Bike Jersey for men has a full-length front zipper and 3 rear pockets.
short_description: Riding at dawn or dusk? You'll be seen a mile away in the men's Craft PB Glow Bike Jersey with its super-reflective print across the chest and upper back.
